name: Depth Siege Atlantis
description:
Atlantis needs your help! Pirates have discovered the treasures below and have begun their siege for loot. Defend Atlantis from the pirates depth charges and save it from oblivion. Depth Siege Atlantis is a fast paced reflex clicker with simple but challenging game play. What starts off easy as days go by the sieges gradually ascends into a frenzy of bombs to fend off. With endless increasing difficulty and multiple speed settings Depth Siege Atlantis will challenge even the most agile gamers.

Features:
Simple Challenging Game Play
Fast Paced Action
Endless Increasing Difficulty
Multiple Speed Settings
